name: Lime Bar
description:
Genre : Management 

 Platform : PC 

 Controls : mouse-only 

 Engine : Unity 

 Language : English

Welcome to the Lime Bar! 

You just opened your lime-themed bar on the tropical paradise of Lime Island. Take client's orders, prepare cocktails and earn money to buy new ingredients!

On the menu : a variety of lime cocktails that you will learn how to make. But you will have to be fast or else you will lose your clients! Buy new ingredients at the store! Context

We are students at l'Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia. This game has been made for a one week jam with the theme "lime".
